meanings.sent1: She is the gooniest person in our class.
meanings.sent2: That is the gooniest hat I have ever seen.
meanings.sent3: His gooniest dance moves always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gooniest clown at the circus had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The gooniest joke he told became a class favorite.

meanings.definition: gooniest: characterized by being silly or foolish
meanings.sent1: The gooniest puppy kept chasing its tail.
meanings.sent2: Their gooniest decision was to wear mismatched socks to the party.
meanings.sent3: The gooniest idea popped into her head at the most unexpected moment.
meanings.sent4: The gooniest behavior at the comedy show had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent5: His gooniest expression always made people smile.

meanings.definition: gooniest: the most awkward or clumsy
meanings.sent1: He felt like the gooniest person on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: Carrying all those books made her feel the gooniest of all.
meanings.sent3: In the gooniest moment, he tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The gooniest waiter managed to spill drinks on every table.
meanings.sent5: The gooniest attempt at juggling ended with a mess on the floor.
